query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS cms_section_templates (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  category ENUM('hero', 'cta', 'testimonials', 'features', 'course_promo', 'government_training', 'team', 'pricing', 'faq', 'newsletter', 'contact', 'content', 'gallery', 'stats', 'divider', 'custom') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'content',
  sectionType VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  config JSON NOT NULL,
  thumbnail VARCHAR(500),
  tags VARCHAR(500),
  language ENUM('en', 'fr', 'bilingual') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'bilingual',
  brand ENUM('rusingacademy', 'lingueefy', 'barholex', 'universal') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'universal',
  isDefault BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT FALSE,
  isPublic BOOLEAN NOT NULL DEFAULT TRUE,
  usageCount INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  createdBy VARCHAR(255),
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  INDEX idx_category (category),
  INDEX idx_sectionType (sectionType),
  INDEX idx_brand (brand),
  INDEX idx_language (language)
);
